reviewText: This instructional DVD was really quite good, I rather enjoyed it. Although Jordu does talk about a book / pamphlet that was to accompany the DVD that was no where to be found, so I guess there is that. But otherwise Jordu is great, and it was a pleasure to watch and work alongside.
I could watch this dude sculpt for days....DAYS!!
Fantastic start to finish demonstration of a creature sculpture.  The techniques shown answered all my questions regarding form, texture, tool usage and more.

The DVD came sealed in new condition. Upon watching it the narrator kept alluding to " the pamphlet"  that came with the disc.  There was nothing in the case other than the DVD.  Does not seem to be Amazon's oversite, but an oversite of the company producing the DVD. Shipping was quick and all else went excellent!
